newsitem.title: USA: Summit Medical, Lilly to develop registry.
newsitem.headline: Summit Medical, Lilly to develop registry.

text.p: Summit Medical Systems Inc on Thursday said it signed a letter of intent with Eli Lilly and Co to develop an international registry for select interventional cardiology procedures.
Under the agreement, Lilly will serve as a sponsor of the registry, which Summit will design, develop and implement.

Using the registry's data, Summit Medical intends to provide participating health-care providers with reports on the short-term and long-term results of interventional cardiology procedures, Summit said.
Summit shares closed down 3/8 at 7-1/4 in Nasdaq trading on Thursday.
